headline: Warner Bros. Discovery, SoFi, PayPal: 3 Trending Tickers
summary: Wealth host Brad Smith examines three of this morning's top trending stocks: Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD) reaches a multi-year renewal deal with Comcast (CMCSA) to bundle the media giant's top channels to Comcast subscribers. SoFi Technologies (SOFI) gets a downgrade to Outperform by Bank of America analysts. On the other hand, BofA analysts upgraded PayPal (PYPL) to a Buy rating on the company's growth potential. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here. This post was written by Luke Carberry Mogan.

headline: Warner and Comcast Resolve ‘Harry Potter’ Dispute in New Distribution Pact
summary: They finalized a cable distribution deal in which Warner locks in higher fees for its networks and resolves a legal battle over a new “Harry Potter” TV series.

raw.headline: Warner and Comcast Resolve ‘Harry Potter’ Dispute in New Distribution Pact
raw.summary: They finalized a cable distribution deal in which Warner locks in higher fees for its networks and resolves a legal battle over a new “Harry Potter” TV series.

headline: Comcast and Warner Bros. Discovery Announce Multi-Year Distribution Agreements Across Xfinity and Sky UK
summary: PHILADELPHIA & NEW YORK, December 09, 2024--Comcast (NASDAQ: CMCSA) and Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. (NASDAQ: WBD) today announced long-term agreements that will deliver WBD’s extensive portfolio of content to Xfinity and Sky UK and Ireland customers using Comcast’s global technology platform across linear television, apps, and streaming services.

raw.headline: Comcast and Warner Bros. Discovery Announce Multi-Year Distribution Agreements Across Xfinity and Sky UK
raw.summary: PHILADELPHIA & NEW YORK, December 09, 2024--Comcast (NASDAQ: CMCSA) and Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. (NASDAQ: WBD) today announced long-term agreements that will deliver WBD’s extensive portfolio of content to Xfinity and Sky UK and Ireland customers using Comcast’s global technology platform across linear television, apps, and streaming services.

headline: Warner Bros. Discovery and the Macao Tourism Office Announce Monumental Macao, Set to Premiere Across Multiple Countries and Regions
summary: Today, Warner Bros. Discovery and The Macao Government Tourism Office (MGTO) announced the release of the documentary Monumental Macao. Produced in partnership with Discovery and Rolling Earth Pictures, and distributed by Discovery, Monumental Macao highlights the historical and cultural insights of Macao, and will premiere on Discovery in several markets across Asia Pacific and internationally.
